## Welcome

The resources on this site are intended to promote Open Science
practices within the Navigating the New Arctic Community and help
community members transition to Open Science.

If you want to learn what Open Science is and why Open Science helps
the scientific endeavour, as well as some steps to start practising
Open Science you can find these on the [Open Science](nna_open_science_fundamental_resources.qmd) page.

If you are looking for resources, go to the [Resources]() page.
